name: BinaryX
introduce: BinaryX is a GameFi development platform behind CyberDragon and CyberArena. CyberDragon is a metaverse on-chain game combining the elements of DeFi, NFTs, and crypto economy in a gaming environment. Users can mine, experience dungeon adventure, PvP gaming, trade in the marketplace for land and castle NFTs in CyberDragon game. CyberArena is a free-to-play card battle game.
